description:
Cuddly Care Protect Antibacterial Concentrated Liquid Fabric Softener Conditioner 900mL 36 Washes is Made in Australia with a Long Lasting Fragrance that Eliminates 999 of Odour Causing Bacteria; Designed for Luxurious Softness Easy Iron Reduces wrinkles Reduces Static Helps clothes look newer for longer and Fast Drying

Cuddly Concentrate Care Protect Antibacterial Liquid Fabric Softener Conditioner leaves your laundry extra soft and hygienically clean

Cuddly Care Protect works by eliminating 999 of odour causing bacteria cotton 24 hours post 50L wash at 25 line dried and then also slowing the growth of odour causing bacteria that develop on fabrics while you use or wear them This unique formula helps further deliver that long lasting freshness youve come to expect so you can give that little bit extra to show you care

Luxurious softness
Odour fighting
Antibacterial protection
Grey water and septic tank safe
Proudly made in Australia
Recyclable packaging

Directions for use fill cap as shown on packaging
Top loader Cuddly can be added to your machines fabric softener conditioner dispensing unit or diluted and added to the final rinse
Front loader Add Cuddly to your machines fabric softener conditioner dispenser unit only This is often marked with a flower

Cuddly is ready to use so there is no need to dilute Never pour directly onto fabrics

Size 900mL
Washes 36

FABRIC SOFTENER CONDITIONER Cuddly Concentrate Care Protect Liquid Fabric Softener Conditioner in front top loader machines for luxurious softness

ODOUR FIGHTING TECHNOLOGY designed with Antibacterial agents which eliminates 999 percent of odour causing bacteria cotton 24 hours post 50L wash at 25 line dried

SOFTEN YOUR FABRICS Softens fabrics makes ironing easier reduces static cling and helps to reduce drying time

READY TO USE Cuddly is ready to use so there is no need to dilute suitable for top loader and front loader washing machines grey water and septic tank safe
name: Cuddly Concentrate Fabric Conditioner Antibacterial Care & Protect 900mL
